home.title: Home
home.welcome: Transforming Ideas into High-Impact Technology Solutions
home.subtitle: CTO & Tech Lead specialized in architecting scalable platforms that deliver extraordinary results
home.description: With over 10 years leading high-complexity projects, I build systems that connect cutting-edge technology with business vision

about.title: About Me
about.headline: Software Engineer with Entrepreneurial DNA
about.subtitle: Expert in transforming complex technical challenges into exponential growth opportunities
about.intro: Full Stack Developer with an entrepreneurial mindset, resilient profile, and focus on overcoming technical challenges. Proactive, adaptable, and committed to continuous learning.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.p1: Throughout my career, I've been architecting, scaling up, and engineering projects from scratch, besides managing development teams and Scrum agile procedures.
journey.p2: I worked with PHP and Java since the beginning of my career. Eventually, a little over 5 years ago I migrated to JavaScript/TypeScript, using frameworks like React, Angular, React Native, Node.js Express, Nest.js, among others.
journey.p3: I've also been coding with Flutter, Python, and Golang at several moments when teams decided to use those languages and frameworks.

integrations.title: Integrations & Technologies
integrations.description: I've integrated applications with various services and APIs that were essential for success in efficiency, usability, and experience:

categories.ai: AI & Machine Learning: OpenAI APIs, ChatGPT, Dall-E, Whisper, Leonardo AI, Fine Tuning, LLM
categories.payments: Digital Payments: Stripe, Cryptomus, NoxPay, Apple Store API
categories.communication: Communication: Twilio (SMS & WhatsApp), SES, SendGrid, SendinBlue
categories.infrastructure: Infrastructure: Redis (Pub/Sub), RabbitMQ, SQS, SNS, ElasticSearch
categories.cloud: Cloud & Storage: AWS, GCP, Heroku, Cloudinary, S3, Firebase

about.pride: I'm very proud that several projects I helped create from scratch have been growing up and selling so fast, making those startups earn big clients around the world.
about.philosophy: I believe I have much more to accomplish because I've always been focused, determined, open-minded, and electrifyingly passionate.
about.cta: You can count on me. Let's keep in touch and change the world for better!

current.title: CTO & Tech Lead
current.description: Leading complete technical conception, development, and delivery of high-performance platforms in Fintech and iGaming.

Management of multidisciplinary technical teams (DevOps, Web Frontend, Mobile)

positions.title: Tech Lead & Senior Software Engineer
positions.description: Tech Lead leading the Credit Emission project and driving technical excellence across full-stack development.
achievements: Architected and developed scalable APIs using NestJS with comprehensive Swagger documentation
Designed robust data solutions with PostgreSQL and Redis caching layers
Implemented containerized deployments using Docker and Kubernetes orchestration
Built responsive front-end applications with React and TypeScript
Automated CI/CD pipelines through GitHub Actions
Monitored production systems with Grafana (DEV/STG) and New Relic (PROD)
Led Individual Development Plans (IDPs) to accelerate team professional growth

positions.title: Tech Lead - Authentication & Permissions Squad

achievements: Hexagonal Architecture in Spring Boot 2.6.8 with Java
TDD with 90% coverage (backend and frontend)
Auth0 & CIAM for corporate authentication
React with Accessibility and internal Voxel framework
DevOps with AWS EKS, S3, Gateway, CodePipeline, STS
Charon for encrypting front-end to back-end requests
